thread.section_title: Stair Supplies Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Stair Supplies | www.stairsupplies.com
thread.title: Alan Aspinall
thread.title_full: Stair Supplies reviewed by Alan Aspinall

author: Alan Aspinall
title: Alan Aspinall
text: There were a couple of things left out of the order, and a post that wasn't made correctly. All were rectified. A design change required shipping back a number of posts for credit, which has yet to be received. All in all, a satisfactory experience, and I would not hesitate to do business with them again.
